TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public interface auto ansi abstract TimeAnimator/ITimeListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Implementors of this interface can set themselves as update listeners to a TimeAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation frame to receive the total time since the animator started and the delta time since the last frame.

remarks.para: Implementors of this interface can set themselves as update listeners to a TimeAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation frame to receive the total time since the animator started and the delta time since the last frame. The first time the listener is called, deltaTime will be zero. The same is true for totalTime, unless the animator was set to a specific prior to starting.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnTimeUpdate (Android.Animation.TimeAnimator animation, long totalTime, long deltaTime);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTimeUpdate(class Android.Animation.TimeAnimator animation, int64 totalTime, int64 deltaTime) cil managed

Docs.param: The animator sending out the notification.
The total time elapsed since the animator started, in milliseconds.
The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

remarks.para: Notifies listeners of the occurrence of another frame of the animation, along with information about the elapsed time.
